title: LeaverBuster Is bullshit.
body: i dced in a game and it wasnt my  fault the internet in my area died for a few mins and i came back and we lost but thats no reason for me to get leaverbuster i had to leave since i was stuck on 500 ping (aka dced) and couldnt do anything about it.
